content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: tripwire_hook
inventory=[{"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a tripwire hook, I need to first craft warped planks which require warped hyphae. The warped hyphae is located at slot 20 and therefore I will move it into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: tripwire_hook
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: I have crafted 4 warped planks which I will now move to a free slot (11) in my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: tripwire_hook
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a tripwire_hook, I need to place 1 iron_ingot and 1 stick in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move the iron_ingot from slot 31 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: tripwire_hook
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Now that the iron_ingot is in the crafting grid, I need to move the stick to the right of it. Slot 4 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the stick to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: tripwire_hook
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that the iron_ingot and stick are in the crafting grid, I need to move a plank block below them. Slot 7 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the warped_plank to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: tripwire_hook
inventory=[{"type": "tripwire_hook", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "fire_coral_block", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "stone_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_stairs", "quantity": 50, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the tripwire_hook by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 2
